• HTML5 game with canvas rendering, procedural terrain generation, and multiplayer via MQTT
  • Mobile-optimized with touch controls, responsive layouts, and device-specific UI adjustments
  • Local save system with IndexedDB, cloud sync via Puter FS, and import/export functionality
  • Admin system for host controls, player management, and world synchronization
  • Shop system with upgrades, consumables, and in-game economy

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game built with HTML5 Canvas and MQTT networking. Players dig through procedurally generated terrain, collect resources, upgrade equipment, and interact with others in real-time. The game features responsive design with mobile controls, a comprehensive save system with cloud sync, and an admin system for host management.
